definitions.text: a conspicuous disparity or difference as between two figures
examples: the spread between lending and borrowing costs

definitions.text: an open or empty space in or between things
examples: there was a small opening between the trees
the explosion made a gap in the wall
he opened the window a crack

definitions.text: a difference (especially an unfortunate difference) between two opinions or two views or two situations
an act of delaying or interrupting the continuity
examples: it was presented without commercial breaks
there was a gap in his account

definitions.text: make an opening or gap in
